name: Infinite Day
description:
Hey Brackey and the community this is my first game ever made so I'm glad to be sharing it with you guys

lets see if you can find a the short cut to get to the last level

this is a three level puzzle Game where you are stuck in a infinite time loop and you have no memory the clues are helping you remember

WASD; for movement or arrows and click for buttons.

sorry for crappy itch page never done one before
